Chromie.name: Sand Blast
Chromie.description: After 0.5 seconds, fire a missile that deals 280 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. Deals 50% damage to Structures.  Casting Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind that mimics Chromie's Sand Blast and Basic Attack, dealing 50% damage. Maximum of 1 Echo active at a time.

Chromie.name: Dragon's Breath
Chromie.description: Vector Targeting Launch 3 blasts into the air that land every 0.75 seconds towards the targeted direction, dealing 195 (+4% per level) damage each.

Chromie.name: Time Trap
Chromie.description: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. Chromie's Trait can be activated to detonate the trap, placing all nearby allied or enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 2 seconds. Maximum of 1 trap active at a time.

Chromie.name: Temporal Loop
Chromie.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.  Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.

Chromie.name: Slowing Sands
Chromie.description: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 5% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.

Chromie.name: Timewalker
Chromie.description: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents 2 levels earlier than her teammates!  Detonate Time Trap  Detonates active Time Traps.

1.name: Once Again the First Time
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 Heroes with Sand Blast.  Reward: Increase the maximum number of active Echoes to 2.

1.name: Deep Breathing
1.description: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 2, up to 50.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 50 and also increase Chromie's vision radius by 100%.

1.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
1.description: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds.  Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: After gathering 15 Globes, Chromie gains 5% Spell Power and her Mana Regeneration is increased by 1.

4.name: Chronic Conditions
4.description: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap are Slowed by 25% for 3 seconds and allies gain 25% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Time Troubles
4.description: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap lose 20 Armor for 3 seconds and allies gain 20 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Andorhal Anomaly
4.description: Increase the charges and maximum active Time Traps to 3, and reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds.

7.name: Bronze Talons
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Sand Blast grants 30% additional Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds.

7.name: Mobius Loop
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Dragon's Breath reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and restores 40 Mana.

7.name: A Proper Greeting
7.description: Damaging a Stunned, Rooted or Slowed enemy Hero grants 25% additional damage for 5 seconds.

10.name: Slowing Sands
10.description: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 5% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.

10.name: Temporal Loop
10.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.  Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.

13.name: Gnome Speed Ahead!
13.description: After casting Sand Blast, Chromie gains 20% Movement Speed and 200% increased Health and Mana Regeneration for 3 seconds.

13.name: Here and There
13.description: Activate to teleport to an area near an Echo, swapping it with Chromie's previous location.

13.name: Time Out
13.description: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 5 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

16.name: Shifting Sands
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 8% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 40%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by the primary Sand Blast.

16.name: Fast Forward
16.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 70% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Quantum Overdrive
16.description: Activate to increase Spell Power by 25% for 10 seconds.

20.name: Unravelling
20.description: Every 0.25 seconds, enemy Heroes Slowed by Slowing Sands have their Spell Armor reduced by 2 up to 30.

20.name: Stuck in a Loop
20.description: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first, and Basic Abilities continue recharging for an additional 3 seconds.

20.name: Piercing Sands
20.description: Sand Blast now pierces all enemies hit.

20.name: Blessing of the Bronze
20.description: While Chromie is alive, her and all allied Heroes gain 10% Movement Speed and their Basic Abilities recharge 30% faster.
